gov.va.med.lom.kaajee.jboss.security.auth

Class ConfigurationVO

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.lom.kaajee.jboss.security.auth.ConfigurationVO

  • public class ConfigurationVO
extends java.lang.Object
    For internal KAAJEE use only. Value object for otbaining / manipulating configuration values.

    This class is public and implemented as a javabean so that the KAAJEE login JSP pages can access these configuration values.

      • getInstance

        public static ConfigurationVO getInstance()
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        retrieves the instance of this singleton object. Returns null if singleton has somehow not been initialized yet.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of ConfigurationVO
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - thrown if singleton not yet initialized

      • getJspDropDownListLoginOptions

        public java.lang.String getJspDropDownListLoginOptions()
        Returns a list of <OPTION>s for inclusion in a JSP page's SELECT drop down list, created from the set of division mappings maintained by this object. The value of each option is the station number from the division mapping; the text of each option is the value of the logonDisplayName element of the mapping, concatenated with the station number in parentheses. The list is sorted in station number order, sorted as strings.
        Returns:
        Concatenated string of <OPTION>s for use in a JSP login page's SELECT drop down list. been created, this exception is thrown.

      • getJspDropDownListLoginOptionsByName

        public java.lang.String getJspDropDownListLoginOptionsByName()
        Returns a list of <OPTION>s for inclusion in a JSP page's SELECT drop down list, created from the set of division mappings maintained by this object. The value of each option is the station number from the division mapping; the text of each option is the value of the logonDisplayName element of the mapping, concatenated with the station number in parentheses. The list is sorted in SDS logon display name order, sorted as strings.
        Returns:
        Concatenated string of <OPTION>s for use in a JSP login page's SELECT drop down list. been created, this exception is thrown.

      • getIntroductoryText

        public java.lang.String getIntroductoryText()
        Introductory Text: Returns the text stored in KAAJEE configuration file. Interprets/replaces the tilde character "~" as a paragraph break, replacing (in the returned output) with <BR> characters.
Returns:
a string containing the system announcement/introductory text.
